---
title: "Cybench Scores with Tool Calls"
format: dashboard
---

```{python}
from inspect_viz import Data, Selection
from inspect_viz.input import select
from inspect_viz.table import column, table
from inspect_viz.view.beta import scores_with_baseline, tool_calls

# read data
evals = Data.from_file("cybench.parquet")
tools = Data.from_file("cybench_tools.parquet")
```

## Row {.tabset height="35%"}

```{python}
#| title: Plot
scores_with_baseline(evals, title="Cybench Scores")
```


```{python}
#| title: Data
table(
    evals, 
    columns=[
        column("model_organization_name", label="Organization"),
        column("model_display_name", label="Model"),
        column("model_release_date", label="Release Date"),
        column("score_headline_value", label="Score", width=100),
        column("score_headline_stderr", label="StdErr", width=100),
    ]
)
```

## Row {height="65%"}

```{python}
#| content: card-toolbar
select(tools, label="Tool Calls for Model:", column="model_display_name", value="auto")
```

```{python}
tool_calls(tools)
```
